characters.name: Saki Watanabe
characters.description: Saki is the main character and narrator of the story. Saki is a new student at the magic school, “Saint Academy”. Once she joins Saint Academy, she hangs out with Satoru, Maria, and Shun, her friends from Wakien Elementary School, as well as Mamoru, her new classmate. While she's not shy, she is sensitive and delicate.

characters.name: Satoru Asahina
characters.description:
A loud, brash 12-year-old who is part of a childhood friend group consisting of himself, Saki, Shun, Maria and Mamoru that attends Sage Academy in Kamisu 66. Satoru is a quick-witted and observant person who cares a lot about his friends despite poking fun at them. He is shown to be particularly close with Saki, as he teases and argues with her more often than the others. Like the rest of the students at the academy, he has a psychic ability called Cantus.

During summer camp, the group of five go off on a wild adventure that leads to Satoru and Saki being separated from the others and them meeting a Queerat named Squealer, who appears trustworthy at first but seems to have dangerous intentions.

characters.name: Maria Akizuki
characters.description:
Maria is Saki's best friend and a beautiful girl with pale, white skin and blazing red hair. She's very strong willed, and commands the weak, quiet Mamoru, but in times of need she devotes herself to protecting him. On the other hand, she does show a girlish fear of scary stories too.   

(Source: Crunchyroll)

characters.name: Shun Aonuma
characters.description: Another one of Saki's childhood friends. Shun is very clever, with a strong intellectual curiosity and mature manners. His marks in magic are excellent at Saint Academy, and many have high hopes for his future. According to Satoru, Shun is the most talented at using the Force in their group.

characters.name: Mamoru Itou
characters.description: After joining Saint Academy and being put in the same class as Saki, he follows them around. He's a very shy boy, and rarely voices his own thoughts and opinions.   ~!As he grows older, he starts to have feelings towards Maria.  He and Maria were killed after their child's birth.!~ (Source: Crunchyroll)

characters.name: Squealer
alt_names: 野狐丸; スクィーラ
characters.description: Squealer is a queerat, an intelligent species that work as servants to humans. Like others of his species, he's small and has the appearance of a giant rat, but is very intelligent and astute. He is the representative of the Robber Fly, a colony of queerats. ~!His ideals are freedom, equality between humans and queerats, and the end of the monarchy system inside of the queerats colonies where the queen is the absolute ruler. He helps [Saki](https://anilist.co/character/57569) and her friends to escape from the wild queerats that were pursuing them. Later, he rescues [Maria](https://anilist.co/character/57573) and [Mamoru](https://anilist.co/character/57589) from the tainted cats and keeps them in his colony. But his main objective was to get a human child from them to start a revolution.  Once he got the child and bred it until it got the cantus, around 10 years old, he uses it to attack the humans. At this time, Squealer is already the leader of an alliance and commands a large number of soldiers.!~

characters.name: Rijin
characters.description: A high priest of the Temple of Purification who seals away the children's telekinesis for breaking the rules and escorts them to be judged.  ~!He is killed by a Balloon Dog (風船犬 Fuusen Inu) while escorts the children.!~  (Source: Wikipedia)

characters.name: Mushin
characters.description: Head Priest of the Temple of Purity.

characters.name: Kiroumaru
characters.description: The supreme commander of the Giant Hornets colony. Despite having orders to kill the children, he risked his life to help them escape.  ~!Much later on, his colony was destroyed by a Fiend sent by Yakomaru and he barely survived. He was briefly held captive at the Temple of Purification before Saki released him. After that, he assisted Saki and her group to Tokyo and eventually sacrificed his life to defeat the Fiend.!~  (Source: Wikipedia)

characters.name: Mizuho Watanabe
characters.description: Saki's mother and also the head of the library.  ~!She entrusted Saki the mission to search for the last weapon of mass destruction "Psychobuster" to eliminate the Fiend.!~ (Source: Wikipedia)

characters.name: Shisei Kaburagi
characters.description: The advisor of the Security Council and also the village's strongest telekinesis user. He wears a hooded mask and has double irises in each eye, capable of detecting and dispelling attacks in all directions.  ~!He also displays calmness and confidence in retaliation against the Monster Rats attack on the village but is still powerless against a Fiend.!~ (Source: Wikipedia)

characters.name: Tomiko Asahina
characters.description: Satoru's grandmother and also the head of the Ethics Committee. She intends for Saki to succeed her position as she possesses a strong mental stability as well as qualities of a leader. Because of this, she had asked the Board of Education not to dispose of Saki and her friends despite knowing about the true history. She also revealed that they were responsible for erasing their bad memories of the past to protect the minds of the townsfolk. She also had a close encounter with a Fiend in the past.  (Source: Wikipedia)
